snippet: As baseball prepares to begin its annual winter meetings, the Mets “may live with certain weaknesses,” General Manager Sandy Alderson said.
lead_paragraph: As baseball prepares to begin its annual winter meetings, the Mets “may live with certain weaknesses,” General Manager Sandy Alderson said.

headline.main: Alderson Tempers Expectations About Mets’ Winter Meeting Plans
headline.print_headline: Alderson Tempers Expectations About Mets’ Winter Meeting Plans
